hero.title: Digital Marketplace for Maritime Industry
hero.subtitle: The trusted platform bringing ship owners and suppliers together
hero.description: With MarineFlux, manage all your vessel needs from one platform. Fast, secure, and transparent.

search.title: Smart Search
search.description: Easily find the products and services you need, compare alternative suppliers

quotation.title: Quick Quotations
quotation.description: Get quotes from multiple suppliers with one request, choose the best one

tracking.title: Order Tracking
tracking.description: Track all your processes in real-time and review historical data

payment.title: Secure Payment
payment.description: Safe and easy payment processes with financial institution partnership

rating.title: Transparent Ratings
rating.description: Make informed decisions with supplier ratings and reviews

support.title: 24/7 Support
support.description: Our experienced team is always here for you

step1.title: Register
step1.description: Join the platform as a shipowner or supplier

step2.title: Specify Needs
step2.description: Shipowners share their needs, suppliers create their offers

step3.title: Compare Quotes
step3.description: Select the best offer and place your order

step4.title: Track
step4.description: Manage the entire process through the platform

cta.title: Get Started Now
cta.description: Join MarineFlux and make a difference in the maritime industry

shipowner.title: Proof of Work for Shipowners
shipowner.subtitle: Discover how shipowners operate on MarineFlux platform, the advantages they gain, and success stories.

supplier.title: Proof of Work for Suppliers
supplier.subtitle: Discover how suppliers and service providers operate on MarineFlux platform, the advantages they gain, and success stories.
